cofh.lib.util.helpers

Class InventoryHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • cofh.lib.util.helpers.InventoryHelper

  • public class InventoryHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains helper functions related to Inventories and Inventory manipulation.

    • Method Detail

      • cloneInventory

        public static ItemStack[] cloneInventory(ItemStack[] inventory)
        Copy an entire inventory. Best to avoid doing this often.

      • addItemStackToInventory

        public static boolean addItemStackToInventory(ItemStack[] inventory,
                              ItemStack stack,
                              int startIndex,
                              int endIndex)
        Add an ItemStack to an inventory. Return true if the entire stack was added.
        Parameters:
        inventory - The inventory.
        stack - ItemStack to add.
        startIndex - First slot to attempt to add into. Does not loop around fully.
        endIndex - Final slot to attempt to add into. Should be at most length - 1

      • addItemStackToInventory

        public static boolean addItemStackToInventory(ItemStack[] inventory,
                              ItemStack stack,
                              int startIndex)
        Shortcut method for above, assumes ending slot is length - 1
